LABEL: 0x99
STRING: I can hear the sough of the wind.

LABEL: 0xD5
STRING: I slowly opened my eyes and looked around.

LABEL: 0x16D
STRING: There's a boy in front of me.

LABEL: 0x1B5
STRING: His name is Itarou. My best and worst friend.

LABEL: 0x1FF
STRING: ...I know.

LABEL: 0x237
STRING: I know that this friend will grow flowers.

LABEL: 0x287
STRING: There is more than one flower. The flowers are different from each other, and yet still the same.

LABEL: 0x2FF
STRING: Does that make sense? Then I'll put it another way: These are alternate worlds.

LABEL: 0x363
STRING: A different Itarou comes in contact with each woman, and before long, they each bloom into a dream.

LABEL: 0x3C5
STRING: I know how each world will end from the very beginning.

LABEL: 0x40C
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x41E
STRING: That's why I am Itarou's friend.

LABEL: 0x465
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x477
STRING: My presence provides color to these flowers...

LABEL: 0x4C4
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x4D6
STRING: ...even if I die.

LABEL: 0x576
STRING: I hear the sough of the wind again.

LABEL: 0x608
STRING: My vision goes black.

LABEL: 0x68C
STRING: There was a flicker of black and white, and when I opened my eyes, I was in a field of flowers.

LABEL: 0x73A
STRING: Under the starry night sky, flowers blow and sway in the wind.

LABEL: 0x7E6
STRING: Even though you know, you still do your part.

LABEL: 0x846
STRING: I hear a girl's voice behind me.

LABEL: 0x888
STRING: I don't look back, and wait for the voice to continue.

LABEL: 0x8D7
STRING: Don't you hate it? You've been treated so unfairly, sometimes you are even killed...

LABEL: 0x94C
STRING: You are always being used as a stage prop, even though you yourself don't want to be.

LABEL: 0x9D3
STRING: You are okay with this?

LABEL: 0xA0C
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xA1E
STRING: Even if I refuse, it won't change anything.

LABEL: 0xAB9
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xACB
STRING: ...I could say the same about you. We're here to support someone.

LABEL: 0xB86
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xB98
STRING: You're the guide, and I am a bystander. Both are out of the way, but they remain critical components for this world.

LABEL: 0xC61
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xC73
STRING: I would think you of all people understand what I mean, Misato?

LABEL: 0xD09
STRING: I then turn around and talk to the girl named Misato with a calm tone.

LABEL: 0xDDA
STRING: Misato said nothing; she just stared at me.

LABEL: 0xE30
STRING: I shrug my shoulders and smile just a little.

LABEL: 0xE7D
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xE8F
STRING: I don't think about it much. I just go through life, enjoying what I can.

LABEL: 0xEF0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0xF02
STRING: And I might even be able to meet a pretty girl. It's a nice perk.

LABEL: 0xF9B
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0xFAB
STRING: ...Even if it is directed by destiny?

LABEL: 0xFFE
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1010
STRING: Yes. It's because I'm me.

LABEL: 0x1053
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1065
STRING: Misato, do you know what a sidekick is?

LABEL: 0x110E
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x111E
STRING: A... sidekick?

LABEL: 0x1153
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1165
STRING: It's a great supporting role. It's not the main character, but it still leaves an impression on the audience. It's called a sidekick.

LABEL: 0x1202
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1214
STRING: Get it? Don't you think it's the perfect word to describe me?

LABEL: 0x12A9
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x12B9
STRING: But it binds you.

LABEL: 0x12FE
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x130E
STRING: I will continue to exist here... in a supporting role.

LABEL: 0x1361
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1373
STRING: That's exactly why.

LABEL: 0x13A4
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x13B6
STRING: I'm a bystander. I can't interfere. That's why I have to carve my name into them as the best supporting actor.

LABEL: 0x1429
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x143B
STRING: But even sidekicks have fans, right?

LABEL: 0x14D4
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x14E4
STRING: Yes. In that case, do as you like.

LABEL: 0x157B
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x158B
STRING: That outlook is rather grounded. You're a very straightforward person.

LABEL: 0x15F2
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1604
STRING: Oh, what is this? Are you worried about me? How cute. I'm free now, what do you say?

LABEL: 0x16D3
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x16E3
STRING: Don't be silly. I'm not that easy.

LABEL: 0x1734
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1746
STRING: I'm joking. Well, let's both do our best.

LABEL: 0x17E6
STRING: I hold my hand out to Misato in a sign of friendship.

LABEL: 0x1840
STRING: Misato was just about to grasp it, but pulled away at the last second.

LABEL: 0x189D
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x18AF
STRING: Eh... Why...? It's just a handshake...

LABEL: 0x1954
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1964
STRING: Wouldn't it make more sense to treat you colder like this?

LABEL: 0x19B5
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x19C7
STRING: ...Haha. Yeah, you got me there.

LABEL: 0x1A56
STRING: Misato

LABEL: 0x1A66
STRING: Hehe. Goodbye, Yukimaru. If we meet again, I'll shake your hand.

LABEL: 0x1AFE
STRING: With that, Misato vanished.

LABEL: 0x1B50
STRING: The only one left is me.

LABEL: 0x1BE0
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1BF2
STRING: I'm Yukimaru. Itarou's best friend, worst friend, and good neighbor.

LABEL: 0x1C98
STRING: I muttered to myself as I looked at the field of flowers.

LABEL: 0x1CE8
STRING: Yeah, I'm not going to change no matter what happens.

LABEL: 0x1D3E
STRING: Not now and not in the future.

LABEL: 0x1D7A
STRING: Character, appearance, behavior... even if the world is different.

LABEL: 0x1DD8
STRING: All of will be the same "Yukimaru."

LABEL: 0x1E71
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1E83
STRING: And now... Well..

LABEL: 0x1F04
STRING: Yukimaru

LABEL: 0x1F16
STRING: In a distant prison, where a die is thrown, we will meet again.

LABEL: 0x1F9A
STRING: Because at that time, I will appear as your best friend.
